headline: City of Danbury Secures Nearly $3.5 Million in National PFAS Settlement Landmark Agreement With 3M Marks Major Victory for Clean Water and Public Health
summary: Working together to protect residents, Ventura Law and the City of Danbury achieved a significant PFAS settlement that ensures cleaner water and a healthier future for their community. DANBURY, CONNECTICUT / ACCESS Newswire / October 21, 2025 / The ...

headline: Here's How Procter & Gamble Looks Ahead of Q1 Earnings Release
summary: PG's innovation and cost-saving focus drive steady organic growth, even as inflation and Greater China pressures weigh on margins.
